data.title: Ben Johnson Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Ben Johnson on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Ben Johnson including Angels in the Outfield, Hang 'Em High, and more.
data.text:
The Case of the Reckless Rockhound

Perry Mason solves the murder of an embezzler and learns the truth about a million-dollar hoarde of diamonds.

Quint-Cident

A lonely widow takes angry revenge after realizing she has mistaken half-breed Quint Asper's kindness for romantic interest. (TV-PG)

Drago

An old trailblazer sets out to track down the slayer of a woman who had befriended him.

Duel at Shiloh

Brian Keith guest stars as Johnny Wade, a drifting cowboy whose love for open range and hatred of fences precipitates a "Duel At Shiloh."
